name: Burning Blood
description: At the end of combat, heal 6 HP.

name: Ring of the Snake
description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.

name: Cracked Core
description: At the start of each combat, channel 1 Lightning.

name: Pure Water
description: At the start of each combat, add a Miracle to your hand.

name: Akabeko
description: Your first Attack each combat deals 8 additional damage.

name: Anchor
description: At the start of each combat, gain 10 Block.

name: Ancient Tea Set
description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start the next combat with 2 additional Energy.

name: Art of War
description: If you do not play Attacks during your turn, gain an extra Energy next turn.

name: Bag of Marbles
description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

name: Bag of Preparation
description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.

name: Blood Vial
description: At the start of each combat, heal 2 HP.

name: Bronze Scales
description: Whenever you take damage, deal 3 damage back.

name: Centennial Puzzle
description: The first time you lose HP each combat, draw 3 cards.

name: Ceramic Fish
description: Whenever you add a card to your deck, gain 9 Gold.

name: Lantern
description: Gain 1 Energy on the first turn of each combat.

name: Meal Ticket
description: Whenever you enter a shop, heal 15 HP.

name: Nunchaku
description: Every time you play 10 Attacks, gain 1 Energy.

name: Oddly Smooth Stone
description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Dexterity.

name: Pen Nib
description: Every 10th Attack you play deals double damage.

name: Preserved Insect
description: Enemies in Elite rooms have 25% less HP.

name: Red Skull
description: While your HP is at or below 50%, you have 3 additional Strength.

name: Regal Pillow
description: Heal an additional 15 HP when you Rest.

name: Vajra
description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Strength.

name: War Paint
description: Whenever you take damage, gain 2 Block.

name: Whetstone
description: Upon pickup, upgrade 2 random Attacks.

name: Blue Candle
description: Whenever you Curse a card, you may play it. If you do, Exhaust it and lose 1 HP.

name: Bottled Flame
description: Upon pickup, choose an Attack. Start each combat with this card in your hand.

name: Bottled Lightning
description: Upon pickup, choose a Skill. Start each combat with this card in your hand.

name: Bottled Tornado
description: Upon pickup, choose a Power. Start each combat with this card in your hand.

name: Darkstone Periapt
description: Whenever you obtain a Curse, increase your Max HP by 6.

name: Eternal Feather
description: For every 3 cards in your deck, heal 3 HP whenever you enter a Rest Site.

name: Frozen Egg 2.0
description: Whenever you add a Skill to your deck, upgrade it.

name: Ginger
description: You can no longer become Weakened.

name: Horn Cleat
description: At the start of your second turn, gain 14 Block.

name: Ink Bottle
description: Every 10 cards you play, draw 1 card.

name: Kunai
description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Dexterity.

name: Letter Opener
description: Every time you play 3 Skills in a single turn, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.

name: Mummified Hand
description: Whenever you play a Power card, a random card in your hand costs 0 for the turn.

name: Ornamental Fan
description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 4 Block.

name: Pantograph
description: At the start of boss combats, heal 25 HP.

name: Paper Crane
description: Enemies with Weak deal 40% less damage rather than 25%.

name: Paper Frog
description: Enemies with Vulnerable take 75% more damage rather than 50%.

name: Pear
description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 10.

name: Question Card
description: Upon pickup, obtain a random card. The card can be any rarity and color.

name: Shuriken
description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Strength.

name: Singing Bowl
description: Whenever you choose to skip a card reward, gain 2 Max HP.

name: Strike Dummy
description: Cards containing 'Strike' deal 3 additional damage.

name: Sundial
description: Every 3 times you shuffle your deck, gain 2 Energy.

name: Symbiotic Virus
description: At the start of each combat, channel 1 Dark.

name: The Boot
description: Whenever you would deal 4 or less unblocked Attack damage, increase it to 5.

name: Toxic Egg 2.0
description: Whenever you add a Power to your deck, upgrade it.

name: Turnip
description: At the end of combat, heal 5 HP.

name: Charon's Ashes
description: Whenever you defeat an enemy, deal 3 damage to all enemies.

name: Bird-Faced Urn
description: Whenever you play a Power card, heal 2 HP.

name: Calipers
description: At the start of your turn, lose 15 Block rather than all of your Block.

name: Dead Branch
description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, add a random card to your hand.

name: Du-Vu Doll
description: For each Curse in your deck, start each combat with 1 additional Strength.

name: Fossilized Helix
description: Prevent the next 5 times you would lose HP in combat.

name: Gambling Chip
description: At the start of combat, discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards.

name: Gremlin Horn
description: Whenever an enemy dies, draw 1 card and gain 1 Energy.

name: Ice Cream
description: Energy is now conserved between turns.

name: Incense Burner
description: Every 6 turns, gain 1 Intangible.

name: Lizard Tail
description: If you would die, heal to 50% of your Max HP instead (works once).

name: Mango
description: Upon pickup, increase your Max HP by 14.

name: Old Coin
description: Gain 300 Gold.

name: Orange Pellets
description: Whenever you play a Power, Attack, and Skill in the same turn, remove all of your debuffs.

name: Peace Pipe
description: At Rest Sites, you may now remove a card from your deck.

name: Pocketwatch
description: Whenever you play 3 or less cards during your turn, draw 3 additional cards at the start of your next turn.

name: Prayer Wheel
description: Normal combats reward an additional card choice.

name: Shovel
description: At Rest Sites, you may dig for a random Relic.

name: Stone Calendar
description: Every 7 turns, gain 2 Strength.

name: Torii
description: Whenever you would receive 5 or less unblocked attack damage, reduce it to 1.

name: Tough Bandages
description: Whenever you discard a card, gain 3 Block.

name: Tungsten Rod
description: Whenever you would lose HP, lose 1 less.

name: Warped Tongs
description: Whenever you add a card to your deck, you may upgrade it.

name: Champion Belt
description: Whenever you apply Vulnerable, also apply 1 Weak.

name: Cursed Key
description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. Whenever you open a chest, become Cursed.

name: Ectoplasm
description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer gain Gold.

name: Fusion Hammer
description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer Smith at Rest Sites.

name: Philosopher's Stone
description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. ALL enemies start with 1 Strength.

name: Runic Dome
description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer see enemy intents.

name: Runic Cube
description: Whenever you lose HP in combat, draw 1 card.

name: Runic Pyramid
description: At the end of your turn, you no longer discard your hand.

name: Slaver's Collar
description: Elite combats are easier. Elites have 50% less HP.

name: Snecko Eye
description: Draw 2 additional cards each turn. Start each combat Confused.

name: Sozu
description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer obtain Potions.

name: Velvet Choker
description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You cannot play more than 6 cards per turn.
